results.title: Becoming a reader
results.brief_description: Presents interviews with various reading experts who indicate a positive approach to parents assisting their children in the reading process. Also shows the types of activities that may be applied by parents to encourage reading and writing.

results.title: No. 1 On the Charts : A Look at the Australian Pop Music Industry
results.creator_credit: Don Fitzsimmons, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and TV Ed Productions
results.brief_description: Lee Simon, Basia Bonkowski, Jane Clifton and Michael Gudinski are interviewed in a forum style program about their views on the presentation of popular culture in the media. Video clips are interposed throughout the program.

results.title: Spelling it out
results.creator_credit: Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
results.brief_description: Shows the teaching of spelling in primary schools from the nineteenth century to the present day. Could be used in conjunction with the Victorian Education Department’s booklet “The Teaching of spelling”. Changing attitudes and a variety of teaching methods are also looked at.

results.title: Teaching strategies in home economics
results.brief_description: First section: Analysis of food patterns, experiments related to food studies and issues of human habitat. Second section: Teaching approaches for textiles education, design and testing. No other credits available.
